column1: promoted, relegated, Cup Qualifier See Rank Key
1. Chelsea qualified for a Europa League group stage berth by virtue of winning the FA Cup.
2. Since EFL Cup winners Manchester City qualified for Champions League, all Europa League berths were awarded based on league position.
